title: Unity3D
jobDescription:
• The XR Experiences team is part of the Design and Customer Experience team in the organization and is responsible for building delightful, consistent, intuitive, and engaging immersive experiences on JioGlass for our B2C customers across Media & Entertainment, Learning, Shopping, Gaming and Productivity; and our B2B enterprise customers across Remote Assistance, Communication & Collaboration and Enterprise learning use-cases.
  • The SSE Unity3D position is an individual contributor role. You will be responsible for architecting, planning, designing, developing and testing new and unique applications for Mixed Reality shaping user experience and overall product development.
  • You will be working with an interdisciplinary team of Unity3D Developers, UI Designers, UX Designers, Unity3D Technical Artists, 3D content creators, sound production and PR involved, and fully immersed in creating initial concepts, prototyping, and development in Unity3D, launch and post-launch relationships with distributors and partners.
Your work at Tesseract will be key in shaping the user journey of millions of Mixed Reality users globally in the coming years.
A portfolio of professional projects including work with web/mobile/AR/VR applications in a must have requirement while applying for this job.
  • Designed and developed consumer grade applications/games in Unity3D.
  • Proactively communicate and collaborate with internal customers to analyze information needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: Functional/Business Requirements, High-Level Architecture, Low-Level Architecture, System Requirements, Design Documents, Wireframe, etc
  • Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs
  • Successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously
  • Drive and challenge product units on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans
  • Serves as the conduit between the product/customer community and the software development team through which requirements flow
  • Develop requirements specifications according to standard templates
  • Be the liaison between the product units, technology, support and IT development teams.
  • Agile software delivery process using JIRA (including breaking down work into modular tasks, updating/tracking task status/work log entries for sprint management), Gerrit/Git (source code management including branching strategy, code review) and Automation Tools.
Job Specification
  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Game Design, Game Development or relevant field.
  • 15+ Years of Experience in game/application development.
  • 7+ Years of Experience in Unity3D based game development
  • 5+ Years of Experience in delivering high-quality consumer applications/games built using Unity3D, preferably over mobile platforms.
  • Proven experience of managing and mentoring a team of 10+ Unity3D developers as senior or lead role.
  • Advanced C#/C++ knowledge with architecture and design patterns.
  • Solid OOPs programming skills and design patterns.
  • Strong mathematical skills, knowledge of vectors, matrices, and linear algebra.
  • Strong knowledge of Unity3D application life cycles, Editor Tools, Events, Actions, Input System, Rendering Pipeline.
  • Strong knowledge of designing state machines and multi-level games/applications in Unity3D.
  • Experience in maintaining Performance & Optimisation in Unity3D Applications.
  • Strong knowledge of Networking APIs in Unity3D.
Desired Skills
  • Experience architecting and developing editor tools for Unity3D.
  • Experience in architecting and developing high-peformant shaders and graphics libraries for Unity3D.
  • Experience in building XR applications/SDKs for Hololens, Magic Leap, Oculus, HTC Vive, etc.
  • Experience in building consumer applications for mixed reality is a huge plus.

title: It Infrastructure Analyst
tagsAndSkills: IT Asset Management,IT Networking,IT Infrastructure,Networks,Servicenow,infrastructure,Infrastructure Management,ServiceNow Event Management

ambitionBoxData.Title: The Dow Chemical Company Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job Description:-


Dow has an exciting opportunity for a Information Technology Analyst located in Mumbai India!  This position is in the Enterprise Delivery Organization with the role aligning to the Implementation Services tower with primary expertise in IT infrastructure. The successful candidate will provide functional and technical expertise, knowledge, and support for Dow's IT infrastructure on projects. Projects typically include Joint Ventures, Mergers, Acquisitions, Divestitures, and Capital Investments.

The IT Analyst has accountability for acting as a voice for business resources in details related to enabling new or changing infrastructure, work processes, or systems capabilities during implementation projects. They are responsible for collaborating with the IT Services teams designing and implementing new or changing infrastructure for project related activities.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Engage and lead the infrastructure design for IT infrastructure related project, leveraging available work processes.
  • Work with peers to define and manage infrastructure requirements.
  • Provide consulting expertise on IT infrastructure related projects.
  • Ensure successful technical/functional handoff of deliverables.
  • Facilitate technology issue resolution across project teams.
  • Lead and influence project team discussions, decisions, and direction for technology items.
  • Design and Build standards, templates and procedures for IT infrastructure related projects.
  • Act as main focal point for Partner Project Managers and Project Managers for the Infrastructure track of assigned projects.
  • Establish and maintain a productive partnership with I/Ss strategic vendors (e.g. IBM, Stefanini, etc.)

General Responsibilities:

  • Help manage cross-functional implementation issues and interdependencies for business process area of expertise.
  • Participate on the development of the implementation approach, strategy and detailed plans.
  • Participate on the development of cutover plans and approach.
  • Gather input and develop the cutover check lists for a specific Information Technology Services & Employee Experience Services process area of expertise.
  • Provide Post Implementation support following production implementations. 
  • Facilitate the closure of defects or act as a liaison for end users to gain closure for defect. 

Required Qualifications:

  • A minimum of a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or equivalent
  • 3 to 5 years of relevant experience.
  • Strong people and communications skills.
  • Strong problem management and issue resolution skills.
  • Relevant experience working with global teams

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Integration support and development (Cloud Platforms, APIs, etc).
  • Knowledge or experience of working with manufacturing or business facing organizations

Note: This position does not offer relocation assistance.


Please apply on the below link:-

https://corporate.dow.com/en-us/careers/jobs/position.R2053525.html ?source=NaukriEMEAI

title: Quality Analyst
tagsAndSkills: Escalation Management,Call Quality,7Qc,Complaint Handling,Call Monitoring,Call Audit,Quality Analysis,Call Calibration
jobDescription:
Hiring for Quality Analyst for Escalation & Compliant Management


Domain; Social media, Telecom Travel, E-commerce with escalation & complaint management.


Shift Time: 24/7 with 2 rotational off

Experience

  • Minimum 2- 3 years of Contact Center Experience with Social Media or Complaint Management desired
  • Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills
  • Outstanding customer service skills and dedication to provide exceptional customer care
  • Analytical & Exceptional time management & listening skills
  • Must be able to effectively deal with people at all levels with internal & external stakeholders of the Company
  • Process certification will apply in case the candidate does not meet the above criteria.

Technical Competencies

  • Ensures adherence to contractual Quality Scores are met
  • Responsible for monitoring agent - customer interactions (both call and transaction) against client specified policies and procedures
  • Provide domain knowledge & track external & internal escalations
  • Responsible for conducting calibration with all the stakeholders of business to ensure standards
  • Report contact handling performance and statistics through monitoring and test contact evaluation.
  • Participate in huddle sessions, share inputs with team members related to error trends, process updates and tech issues. Working in close tandem with Asst. Managers and SME's on the process for an excellent team and process performance.
  • Report contact handling performance and statistics through daily and weekly reports
  • Review evaluations, maintain call recordings for audits
  • Prepare performance evaluations and documenting contact-handling procedures
  • Prepare TNAs basis the audit done and coordinate with the training team to ensure the TNA is executed
  • Effective One-on-one feedback to the associates basis the audit done
  • Calibrate with Global customer and circulate learning to the Agents/floor
  • Perform day to day transactional monitoring as per the defined format and sampling
  • Provide detailed feedback on transaction handling process as well as softer aspects of the behaviour.
  • Document and provide feedback to Agents.
  • Report quality trends and variances to management center.
  • Ad hoc one-on-one coaching of Agents.


Others:

  • Communicate company vision, mission, and goals. Ensure complete alignment of the functional / service line teams to overall company objectives
  • Responsible for complying with all QMS and ISMS Policies and procedures
  • Ensure data confidentiality, integrity and protection of company's intellectual property
  • Create a work environment that nurtures and supports diversity and has an inclusive work culture.

Mandatory:

  • Excellent communication and management skills
  • Excellent customer and client relationship skills
  • Commitment to achieve deadlines provided and result oriented
  • Ability to make sound judgment & be decisive
  • Logical thinking and attitude for learning
  • Delight customers, and go above and beyond the call of duty
  • Has empathy for the customers situation
  • Works with highest degree of accuracy and with eye for detail
  • Build a long-term relationship with the customer in the best interest of both customer and client
  • Able to work under pressure and with stringent timelines during times of need in rotational shifts/day and even on regional holidays

Thanks & Regards,

Taskeen Ansari

Talent Acquisition Group Hexaware

Mobile: +91 7977783899

Email : taskeena@hexaware.com
